yarn:
echo '#!/usr/bin/env bash'>>ExecScript.sh
echo ''>>ExecScript.sh
echo ''>>ExecScript.sh
echo '#---------------------------------------------------------'>>ExecScript.sh
echo '# Staging Input Files'>>ExecScript.sh
echo ''>>ExecScript.sh
echo ''>>ExecScript.sh
echo '#---------------------------------------------------------'>>ExecScript.sh
echo '# Creating Executing Command'>>ExecScript.sh
echo 'start=`date +%s.%3N`'>>ExecScript.sh
echo 'python "test.py"  1>Ystdout 2>Ystderr'>>ExecScript.sh
echo 'stop=`date +%s.%3N`'>>ExecScript.sh
echo 'time_spent=$(echo $stop - $start | bc)'>>ExecScript.sh
echo 'echo $time_spent >>Yprof'>>ExecScript.sh
echo ''>>ExecScript.sh
echo ''>>ExecScript.sh
echo '#---------------------------------------------------------'>>ExecScript.sh
echo '# Staging Output Files'>>ExecScript.sh
echo 'start=`date +%s.%3N`'>>ExecScript.sh
echo 'YarnUser=$(whoami)'>>ExecScript.sh
echo 'scp -v Ystderr Ystdout $YarnUser@test_ip:/tmp'>>ExecScript.sh
echo 'stop=`date +%s.%3N`'>>ExecScript.sh
echo 'time_spent=$(echo $stop - $start | bc)'>>ExecScript.sh
echo 'echo $time_spent >>Yprof'>>ExecScript.sh
echo 'scp -v Yprof $YarnUser@test_ip:/tmp'>>ExecScript.sh
echo ''>>ExecScript.sh
echo ''>>ExecScript.sh
echo '#End of File'>>ExecScript.sh


yarn -jar ../Pilot-YARN-0.1-jar-with-dependencies.jar com.radical.pilot.Client -jar ../Pilot-YARN-0.1-jar-with-dependencies.jar -shell_script ExecScript.sh  -container_vcores 8 -service_url yarn://test_ip?fs=hdfs://test_ip:54170
